events.name: Holiday Ice Skating
events.description: Public ice skating session at Bird Arena, a fun holiday activity for all ages.

events.name: Holiday Craft Workshop
events.description: Create festive holiday decorations in this hands-on craft workshop. All materials provided, registration required.

events.name: Live Music: The Honey Dewdrops
events.description: Folk duo The Honey Dewdrops perform live at Stuart's Opera House. Tickets available online and at the door.

events.name: Athens Farmers Market
events.description: Local farmers and artisans selling fresh produce, baked goods, crafts, and more.

events.name: Ohio University Hockey vs. Miami University
events.description: Watch the Ohio University Bobcats hockey team take on their rivals, the Miami University RedHawks.
